_currentLevelIndexComment: Specifies which level to load from the levels array

floor._colorComment: color must be a web color, e.g. #0033cc

levels._scoreColours: indicates which scores to keep track of for this level
levels._entitiesTypeComment: options include cloud, enemy, static, boundary, background

genericEntities._imageComment: This is an optional field. A suitable default will be selected if it is not provided.

hero._sizeComment: options include small, medium, large. If not specified this field will default to medium
